original_title: Money, Banking and the Federal Reserve
overview: Most Americans have no idea of what the central bank does to the economy, or to their own economic lives; of how and why it was founded and operates; or of the sound money and banking that could end the inflation, and business cycles that the Federal Reserves generates.
tagline: To most Americans today, Federal Reserve is just a name on the dollar bill...
title: Money, Banking and the Federal Reserve
